name: FNF Luca Test
description:
FNF Luca Test

Here you will be able to test one of the newest Friday Night Funkin characters named Luca. So yeah, this is a new Fnf Test Character, a sort of Fnf Test Playground but just with Luca.

Controls:

  • N - next animation
  • M - mute
  • A - cut scene with Luca transformation
  • S - cut scene with Boyfriend
  • Backspace - go back
  • Arrows - sing the vocals

The FNF Luca Test was made with images and sounds from Vs Luca Version 1.2 (sorta demo) from Gamebanana: https://gamebanana.com/mods/298149, official FNF mod made by GERShark8209, Atsuover.

If you like this FNF Test with Luca, don't forget to give it 5 stars and a nice comment. And if you need more FNF Test games, let me know with which character you want me to make the next one?
